title: Succession Planning at AT&T
text: AT&T uses analytics to identify high-potential employees and develop them for future leadership roles. By analyzing HR data such as performance metrics, skills, and career aspirations, AT&T can create targeted development plans for its employees.
cta: Enhanced leadership pipeline, improved talent retention, increased employee engagement, and better alignment with organizational growth.

title: Performance Management at Deloitte
text: Deloitte uses a data-driven approach to performance management. The company utilizes analytics to measure employee performance, provide feedback, and identify areas for improvement.
cta: Improved employee performance, enhanced feedback quality, increased productivity, better skill development, and alignment with organizational goals.
